<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current sound volume (set by [[fadeSound]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''soundVolume'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[soundVolume]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fadeSound]], [[musicVolume]], [[radioVolume]], [[speechVolume]], [[environmentVolume]], [[getAudioOptionVolumes]]
</value></part></template>
